sen.j: 瀞八丁（どろはっちょう）は、和歌山県新宮市から奈良県吉野郡十津川村にまたがる峡谷。
sen.e: Dorohaccho Gorge is a gorge which extends from Shingu City, Wakayama Prefecture to Totsukawa-mura, Yoshino-gun, Nara Prefecture.
Dorohaccho Gorge is a gorge which extends from Shingu City, Wakayama Prefecture to Totsukawa-mura, Yoshino-gun, Nara Prefecture.
Dorohaccho Gorge is a gorge which extends from Shingu City, Wakayama Prefecture to Totsukawa-mura, Yoshino-gun, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 瀞峡の下流（下瀞）にあたり、熊野川の玉置口・洞天門から田戸までの区域をいう。
sen.e: It is located along the lower reach of the Doro Gorge (Shimodoro), and refers to the district from Totenmon, the Tamakiguchi of Kumano River to Tado.
It is located downstream of the Doro Gorge (Shimodoro), and refers to the district from Totenmon, the Tamakiguchi of Kumano River to Tado.
sen.cmt: along the lower reach of --> downstream of
sen.e: It is located downstream of the Doro Gorge (Shimodoro), and refers to the district from Totenmon, the Tamakiguchi of Kumano River to Tado.

sen.j: 峡谷の両岸に高さ50mにおよぶ断崖、巨石、奇岩、洞窟が1km以上続く日本屈指の景勝渓谷である。
sen.e: Cliffs reaching almost 50 meters, gigantic stones, odd rocks, and caves, which are lined more than one kilometers, are one of the best scenic gorges in Japan.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Cliffs reaching almost 50 meters, gigantic stones, odd rocks, and caves, which are lined more than one kilometers on both sides of the gorge; this scenery makes Dorohaccho Gorge be one of the best scenic gorges in Japan.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れあり。「峡谷の両岸に」の訳を追加、その他表現の見直し
sen.e: Cliffs reaching almost 50 meters, gigantic stones, odd rocks, and caves, which are lined more than one kilometers on both sides of the gorge; this scenery makes Dorohaccho Gorge be one of the best scenic gorges in Japan.

sen.j: 国の特別名勝、および天然記念物に指定されている。
sen.e: It is designated as a nation's special place of scenic beauty.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: It is designated as a nation's special place of scenic beauty and natural monument.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れあり。「天然記念物」の訳を追加
sen.e: It is designated as a nation's special place of scenic beauty and natural monument.
Meotoiwa Rock (the rocks like a married couple)
Meotoiwa Rock (the rocks like a married couple)
Meotoiwa Rock (the rocks like a married couple)
Byobu-Iwa (sheer [perpendicular] cliff) (20 meters in height, 87 meters in width)
Byobu-Iwa (sheer [perpendicular] cliff) (20 meters in height, 87 meters in width)
Byobu-Iwa (sheer [perpendicular] cliff) (20 meters in height, 87 meters in width)

sen.j: ウォータージェット船乗り場
西日本旅客鉄道紀勢本線 新宮駅 から熊野交通バス「熊野本宮」行きで35分、「志古」下車
sen.e: After 35 minutes by KUMANO KOTSU line bus, `Kumano-hongu Shrine bound' from Shingu Station of JP West Kisei Main Line, get off the bus at `Shiko.'
After 35 minutes by KUMANO KOTSU line bus, `Kumano-hongu Shrine bound' from Shingu Station of the JP West Kisei Main Line, get off the bus at `Shiko.'
sen.cmt: JP West Kisei Main Line に定冠詞the を付与
sen.e: After 35 minutes by KUMANO KOTSU line bus, `Kumano-hongu Shrine bound' from Shingu Station of the JP West Kisei Main Line, get off the bus at `Shiko.'
Wasen (Japanese Style of Small Fishing Boat) boarding point
Wasen (Japanese Style of Small Fishing Boat) boarding point
Wasen (Japanese Style of Small Fishing Boat) boarding point

sen.j: JRきのくに線 新宮駅 から熊野交通バス「熊野本宮」行きで40分、「宮井大橋」下車。
sen.e: After 40 minutes by KUMANO KOTSU line bus, `Kumano-hongu Shrine bound' from Shingu Station of JR Kinokuni line, get off the bus at `Miyai Ohashi.'
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: After 40 minutes by KUMANO KOTSU line bus, `Kumano-hongu Shrine bound' from Shingu Station of the JR Kinokuni line, get off the bus at `Miyai Ohashi.'
sen.cmt: JP Kinokuni Line に定冠詞the を付与
sen.e: After 40 minutes by KUMANO KOTSU line bus, `Kumano-hongu Shrine bound' from Shingu Station of the JR Kinokuni line, get off the bus at `Miyai Ohashi.'

sen.j: 熊野交通バス「玉置川口」行きに乗換えて30分、終点下車。
sen.e: Transfer to KUMANO KOTSU line bus, `Tamaki Kawaguchi-bound' and get off the bus at the last bus stop, `Tamaki Kawaguchi' after 30 minutes ride.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Transfer to KUMANO KOTSU line bus, `Tamaki Kawaguchi-bound' and get off the bus at the last bus stop, `Tamaki Kawaguchi' after a 30 minutes ride.
sen.cmt: after 30 minutes ride --> after a 30 minutes ride
sen.e: Transfer to KUMANO KOTSU line bus, `Tamaki Kawaguchi-bound' and get off the bus at the last bus stop, `Tamaki Kawaguchi' after a 30 minutes ride.
